original_title: One killed, 3 injured in clash between Moragahakanda water project workers
original_body_lines: One person has been killed and three others injured in a clash between two groups of workers of the North Central Province ‘Maha Ela’ Project, which is another phase of the Moragahakanda water project.
Police said that one of the workers had carried out a knife attack, and that one of the employees who was seriously injured, died on the spot.
Two other injured individuals have been admitted to the Polonnaruwa Teaching Hospital, while another injured person is currently receiving treatment at Habarana Hospital, according to police.
